title: What is the cheapest Apple product you can buy? - Quora

response.answer_text: For only US$9 you can get… ! Lightning to 3.5 mm Headphone Jack Adapter

The most valuable Apple product you can buy is probably their laptops (MacBook Pro’s). They are great and are by far Apple’s greatest product line. It has the best long term value of all their products, and especially if you can utilise them to make money in the future (study, development, writing etc). It might even become an investment in your life and not just a consumer product that is draining your economy.
